titles.title: Continuing Federal Employee Leave Policy Act of 2019
Continuing Federal Employee Leave Policy Act of 2019
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide accrual of annual and sick leave for Federal employees of an agency subject to a lapse in appropriations, and for other purposes.
Continuing Federal Employee Leave Policy Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
